item.title: OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused - Live Science
item.description:
1. OpenAI's 'smartest' AI model was explicitly told to shut down — and it refused  Live Science
  2. Opinion | AI Is Learning to Escape Human Control  WSJ
  3. OpenAI model disobeys humans, refuses to shut down. Elon Musk says ‘concerning’  Hindustan Times
  4. Experts Warn of AI’s Self-Preservation Tactics in New Tests  Men's Journal
  5. Researchers claim ChatGPT o3 bypassed shutdown in controlled test  BleepingComputer
